summary: Modest bank employee and passionate billiard player in his spare time, Bernard Noblet is bored stiff.
cast: Jean Seberg|Claude Rich|Elsa Martinelli|Pierre Vernier|Jacques Morel|Jean-Paul Moulinot|Jacques Balutin|Elisabeth Flickenschildt|France Rumilly|Daniel Ceccaldi|Claude Darget|Henri Virlojeux|Annette Poivre|Jacques Dynam|Pierre Mirat|Jean-Pierre Rambal|Jacques Santi|Norma Dugo|Michel Danjou|Bernard Musson|Yves Arcanel|Louis Viret|Paul Pavel|Marcel Gassouk|Ady Berber|Günther Jerschke|Günter Lüdke|Horst Pasderski|Walter Roderer|Werner Schwier|Günther Ungeheuer|Marcel Charvey|André Dalibert|Yves Elliot|Marius Gaidon|Max Melder|Gaston Meunier|Laure Paillette|Jacques Préboist
title: Mil millones en un billar
